title.rendered: Inventory Funding with Sean De Clercq of Kickfurther.com

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 34:45 — 31.8MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 34:45 — 31.8MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Sean De Clercq is the CEO of Kickfurther.com. He has years of experience in the supply chain industry. When seeking financing for his merchandising company, he came up with the original idea behind Kickfurther.

We find out the best scaleable solution when it comes to funding a growing business.

 

You’ll Learn:

  • The problems with funding inventory.
  • How the principle of “discounted purchase of future revenue” works.
  • The difference between equity and debt from the E-commerce business.
  • When to not fund inventory via debt.
  • How Kickfurther works for your business.
  • Criteria to get funding.
